summary: English Translation of Archery Tree Improver by Glf.
descriptionHtml:
This is an English translation of Archery Tree Improver found [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53398/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D53398%26preview%3D&pUp=1http://]HERE [/url]
Luckily, my girlfriend speaks fluent French so she translated while I fixed.

This mod adds a few new levels of existing perks to make your Archer even more awesome than you already are!

Perks are:
[u]Archery[/u]
Overdraw Ranks 6 & 7 (originally only 5) - Increases bow damage by 120%/150%.
Quick Shot Rank 2 (Originally only 1) - Reload 50% faster.

[b]*New Perk*[/b] Bleeding Rank 1, 2, & 3 - Causes your target to bleed for 1.5/3/6 points of damage for 3/6/9 seconds.

[u]Sneak
[/u]Deadly Aim Rank 1, 2, & 3 (originally 1) - Sneak Attacks with Bows deal triple/four times/ six times their damage.
author: Glf - Translation by zanatos2003
